comments: The class is very informative and interesting however it is a ton of work. There are tons of movies to watch and a lot to read. Exams are very specific. The professor is very hard to get ahold of so questions go unanswered for quite a while.. I would not recommend this class if you don\'t have to the time to put into it
Online Wintersession class is challenging but you\'ll learn a lot. Professor is very helpful, engaging and lively. I highly recommend.

She\'s a cool professor who\'s really experienced/involved and knows a lot about the subject. I wouldn\'t say it was easy or hard but she is a lenient grader because I got a better grade than expected. I learned a lot about Native Americans and appreciated it because it led me to find a greater meaning behind their position in human history.

very knowledgeable about the subject, but assigned far too many papers/projects within the last two weeks of the semester. Literally had a huge paper, a field experience paper, and FIVE take home essays for the final all due within the last two weeks.

Horrible class. She is so disorganized. Too much on her plate, and she can\'t handle it. I was confused the whole semester because her directions are unclear. She\'s a scatter brain and the slowest grader on the planet. I would never take a class with her again. Trust me, you will hate it.

She was ever so inspiring and although anthropoly isent my "thing" I learned alot and though she was a great teacher with alot of expirence to back it up.Nice down to earth person. Lucky to have her as your professor!
I thought that she was fun to listen to even when she was off topic.
She gets off subject a lot and is a very hard grader. I did not enjoy her class. We watched way too many movies, and spent too much time on usless subject matters.
